topic: Hackfish Project: AI Power Media Processing

children.summary: Manually listening to audio or video files, taking notes, and searching for key points is time-consuming and inefficient.
Listening to an entire recording just to find one important moment is a huge waste of time.
Manually summarizing long discussions and skipping through videos randomly hoping to find key parts is frustrating.
An AI-powered tool that makes audio and video files searchable, interactive, and insightful.
High-accuracy speech-to-text with background noise or multiple accents, sentiment analysis, name detection, key topic detection, and interactive features like keyword search and clickable timestamps.
High-accuracy transcription even with background noise or multiple accents.
Detects emotions in speech, useful for analyzing customer calls, debates, or interviews.

children.topic: Name Detection and Key Topic Detection
children.summary: Identifies names, places, and key topics in audio and video files.
Keyword search, clickable timestamps, and a mind map feature for easy navigation of the conversation.
Jump to an important moment by searching for a keyword.
Access specific moments in audio or video files with clickable timestamps.
Visualize the conversation with a mind map, making it easier to understand key topics and connectors.
Using XJS, TypeScript, Node.js, express, OpenIS Whisper local model for transcription, VideoGS for sentiment analysis, and PostgreSQL with the possibility to scale to NeonDB.
Using XJS and TypeScript for a smooth user interface.
Using Node.js and express for handling the backend.
Using OpenIS Whisper local model for transcription.
Using VideoGS for sentiment analysis.
Using PostgreSQL with the possibility to scale to NeonDB for storing bookmarks and timestamps.
Anyone who deals with audio or video content, including corporations, students, legal teams, content creators, and support teams.
Extract key decisions from long meetings, automate transcription for research purposes.
Summarize lectures, study smart with automatic transcripts.
Generate automatic transcripts for key studies, analyze customer interactions.
Repurpose the best moments from audio and video files.
Analyze customer interactions for better service, summarize long conversations.
